channel.title: Finnish Meteorological Institute warnings
channel.description: Finnish Meteorological Institute open data (CAP) warnings in effect for the next 0-5 days

item.title: REMOVED: Yellow wind warning for sea area: Western Gulf of Finland, Sat 16.00 - 23.00
item.description: REMOVED: Wind warning for sea areas: South near gale 14 m/s from the afternoon on.
item.author: cap@fmi.fi (Finnish Meteorological Institute)

item.title: REMOVED: Orange traffic weather warning: The eastern part of the country, Sun 1.00 - 20.00
item.description: REMOVED: Traffic weather warning: From the night between Saturday and Sunday to Sunday evening, probability for very bad road conditions is 40% because of freezing rain and snow.
item.author: cap@fmi.fi (Finnish Meteorological Institute)

item.title: Yellow wind warning for sea area: Southern Sea of Bothnia and Bay of Bothnia, Sun 0.00 - Mon 0.00
item.description: Wind warning for sea areas: Northwest near gale 16 m/s from the midnight on.
item.author: cap@fmi.fi (Finnish Meteorological Institute)

item.title: Yellow wind warning for sea area: Southern Sea of Bothnia, Sat 5.43 - Sun 0.00
item.description: Wind warning for sea areas: Southeast gale 17 m/s at first.
item.author: cap@fmi.fi (Finnish Meteorological Institute)

item.title: Yellow wind warning for sea area: Gulf of Finland, Sun 0.00 - 9.00
item.description: Wind warning for sea areas: Southwest near gale 14 m/s by night and in the morning.
item.author: cap@fmi.fi (Finnish Meteorological Institute)

item.title: Yellow pedestrian weather warning: The southern part of the country, Wed 10.00 - Thu 0.00
item.description: Pedestrian weather warning: Very slippery pavements are expected starting before noon because of water on top of icy pavement surfaces.
item.author: cap@fmi.fi (Finnish Meteorological Institute)

item.title: Yellow wind warning for sea area: Locally on all sea areas, Sat 5.43 - Sun 0.00
item.description: Wind warning for sea areas: Southeast near gale 14 m/s at first.
item.author: cap@fmi.fi (Finnish Meteorological Institute)

item.title: Yellow wind warning for sea area: Locally on all sea areas, Sun 0.00 - Mon 0.00
item.description: Wind warning for sea areas: Northwest near gale 14 m/s from the midnight on.
item.author: cap@fmi.fi (Finnish Meteorological Institute)

item.title: Yellow traffic weather warning: Ã…land and Varsinais-Suomi, Sat 5.43 - Sun 12.00
item.description: Traffic weather warning: Bad road conditions are expected at first because of snow or sleet.
item.author: cap@fmi.fi (Finnish Meteorological Institute)

item.title: Yellow traffic weather warning: Southern Lapland and locally in North Ostrobothnia, Sat 23.00 - Sun 12.00
item.description: Traffic weather warning: Bad road conditions are expected from the late evening on because of snow.
item.author: cap@fmi.fi (Finnish Meteorological Institute)

item.title: Orange traffic weather warning: Locally in the middle and northern parts of the country, Sat 5.43 - Sun 12.00
item.description: Traffic weather warning: Very bad road conditions are expected at first because of snowstorm.
item.author: cap@fmi.fi (Finnish Meteorological Institute)

item.title: Orange traffic weather warning: Locally in the southern and middle parts of the country, Sat 5.43 - Sun 12.00
item.description: Traffic weather warning: Very bad road conditions are expected at first because of freezing rain, snow or sleet and snowstorm.
item.author: cap@fmi.fi (Finnish Meteorological Institute)
